statements: UPDATE reservations SET status = 'confirmed' WHERE reservation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE reservations SET customer_name = 'John Doe', booking_date = '2022-09-15', start_time = '09:00:00', end_time = '12:00:00', status = 'CONFIRMED' WHERE reservation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
